teacherStrengths.content: several teaching strategies to cater for all learners were utilized
skills were broken down into a learnable part
constructive feedback was provided for activities and skills being practiced

teacherWeakness.content: teacher was adequately prepared for class
teacher did not utilize resources well
teacher did not cater for all learning style
teacher was not effective in lesson delivery
no feedback was offered to students

teacherWayForward.content: reflect on lesson and no modifications in future lessons
